document.title: Technical Bulletins: The Anti-Drug Abuse Act of 1986 Looks to State and Local Involvement and Participation
document.abstract: This Technical Bulletin discusses the Anti-Drug Abuse Act of 1986 (Public Law 99-570, signed October 27, 1986), which authorized the Bureau of Justice to make grants to states for their use and/or the use of local government.
